description: Defines a ProductMapper class responsible for converting between Product entity objects and their corresponding Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) such as ProductRequest and ProductResponse. Contains methods for entity-to-DTO mapping, DTO-to-entity conversion, and updating existing entities.

classes.name: ProductMapper
classes.description: A Spring component that provides methods to convert between Product entities and DTOs, facilitating data transformations within the application.

methods.name: toEntity
methods.description: Converts a ProductRequest DTO into a new Product entity, copying relevant properties.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Transforms a Product entity into a ProductResponse DTO for client communication.

methods.name: updateEntityFromRequest
methods.description: Updates an existing Product entity with data from a ProductRequest DTO.
